Title: KUT Special Scholarship Program in Japan | Fully Funded
Description:
The KUT Special Scholarship Program in japn is now open for applciations. Thisfully funded scholarship programinvites exceptional students from different regions of the world to contribute in research related programs. During Kochi University of Technology scholarship, students will get education in a supportive environment. They will get  fee exemption for 3 years and will also receive allowance for traveling and living expenses. The KUT Japan scholarship for international students will be a unique experience as scholars will explore diverse cultures and develop good bonds with their fellows from different backgrounds.
KUTscholarship program for doctoral studentsis a three year research degree program. During this program, students will acquire extensive knowledge and valuable skills to become a qualified researcher. KUT scholarship in Japan for international students is offered in different fields of research which include Intelligent Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering, Electronic and Photonic Engineering, Architecture and Infrastructure Design, Engineering Science, Informatics, Data and Innovation, and Economics and Management.
During each semester of Japan research scholarship, students will submit their research plan and research report. First and second year doctoral students will get English research writing class. They will also get Japanese language class for everyday communication. International students will get guidance from supervisors related to their academic and research work. Students will get a chance to attend different Japanese cultural activities and programs. Before completing the degree, students have to publish research papers in leading peer-reviewed journals which will add value to their research experience.
Deadline:
mid october
Apply NowOfficial LinkJoin our WhatsApp Channel
Eligibility: Applicants should be from East Asia, Southeast/South Asia, the Middle East, Europe, North America, Africa and others.Maximum 3 SSP students can be enrolled for each supervisor. The details of supervisors available to host are mentioned on the official website.Applicants should have permission from their preferred supervisor to apply for this program.Applicants should have a master’s degree or equivalent degree acquired after 18 years of education.Applicants must be 35 years old or under this age while applying.Applicants should have excellent academic record.Applicants should have sufficient knowledge and research skills.Applicants must have high English language proficiency.

Title: MEXT Research Scholarship For Pakistani Students 2026 | Fully Funded
Description:
The MEXT Research Scholarship 2026 is one of the best research scholarships for Pakistani students. Thisfully funded scholarshipopportunity is offered by the Government of Japan to Pakistani students. Master’s and PhD students from all over Pakistan can apply for this amazing opportunity. There is no need for IELTS/TOEFL to apply for this scholarship program. Students can apply for almost every field of study under this program. It is a great chance to study at top universities in Japan. For students from other countries or those looking for more general information about the MEXT Scholarship, please refer to ourcomprehensive article on the MEXT Scholarship
Japan is a leading country, growing in technology and knowledge. The advanced education system allows the students to transform their ideas into creative products. Candidates can apply in a number of fields to get hands-on research experience except the fields related to the specific factories or technologies, medicine, or clinical training. The MEXT Japanese Government Scholarship – Embassy Recommendation helps scholars build cross-cultural understanding and create goodwill between Japan and Pakistan. It also encourages scholars to work on research that benefits Pakistani communities and societies.
Eligibility: Pakistani students are eligible to apply.A candidate should be good in health.Applicants who have completed a bachelor’s or master’s degree can apply.Applicants who are pursing bachelor’s or master’s degree in Pakistan can also apply.For complete details about this scholarship visit the official website MEXT Scholarship for 2026 Embassy Recommendation and read theApplication Guidelines for Research Students
Program Duration: MEXT Master’s Degree Program: 2 to 3 YearsMEXT Doctoral Program: 3 to 4 Years

Title: MEXT Scholarship Guide | Japanese Government (MEXT) Scholarship
Description:
The Japanese Government (MEXT) Scholarship is a great opportunity for students from all over the world to study in Japan for free. It is funded by the Japanese government through the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science, and Technology (MEXT). This scholarship pays for your tuition, living expenses, travel costs, and more. It helps students at all levels, like undergraduate, graduate, research, and training. This MEXT Scholarship Guide will help you understand everything you need to know about this fully funded scholarship in Japan.
Why Study in Japan?Japan is famous for its amazing advanced education system. The universities in Japan are some of the best in the world. They offer a mix of traditional learning and modern technology. Studying in Japan is not just about getting a degree; it’s also about experiencing Japanese culture and making new friends from around the globe. You will gain valuable skills and knowledge while exploring a beautiful and safe country.
Japan is a friendly and welcoming place for students from around the world. It’s a country that beautifully mixes old traditions with modern technology. Studying in Japan means getting a top-quality education while also growing as a person. As a MEXT scholar, you will join a global community of students, make new friends from different cultures, and gain valuable international experience. This MEXT Scholarship Guide will show you how to make your dream of studying in Japan come true.
Eligibility: The rules for who can apply depend on the type of scholarship. Here’s a quick look:

Title: MEXT Undergraduate Scholarship 2026 in Japan | Fully Funded
Description:
Call for applications for the MEXT Undergraduate Scholarship in Japan. This scholarship is offered to undergraduate students who will study at top Japanese national universities across the country. It is provided by the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science, and Technology (MEXT) of Japan. This is a fully funded scholarship, and almost all expenses of the selected applicants will be covered by MEXT.
TheMEXT Scholarship 2026is one of thet top scholarship program in the world. It is very competitive and well funded opportunity for international. During this prestgious scholarship program, students will not only be taught academic courses, but will also develop their skills and competencies. These abilities will help them in their advanced studies and future careers as well. MEXTscholarships for undergraduate studentswill help to promote relationship between Japan and students’ countries. Students will conduct research in laboratories which are equipped with latest facilities. While studying, students will experience the Japanese culture along with other diverse cultures of the world.
All grantees will be enrolled at a preparatory educational institution appointed by MEXT for the first year of their scholarship period. This preparatory course is a comprehensive one-year program that includes Japanese language and other subjects. For students majoring in Social Sciences and Humanities, the subjects include Japanese affairs, Mathematics, English, and Social Studies. For those majoring in Natural Sciences, the subjects include Physics, Chemistry, and Biology. The host university will be decided by MEXT, the host university itself, and the preparatory educational institution. The decision will be based on the results of the first screening examination, progress at the preparatory institution, chosen major, and availability of seats at the university.
Deadline:
Varies for different programs and universities. Check deadlines on the official website before applying.
For more info visit:
Eligibility:
Students who are currently enrolled in an undergraduate program at a university. or Students who are getting preparatory education in Japanese language and other subjects before their placement in undergraduate program at the university.
A student who completes the preparatory education will get admission in Japanese university after passing the entrance examination.Grantees will not be allowed to change their courses afterGrantees cannot transfer to another university during the preparatory education course or the undergraduate course.Grantees have to study the compulsory subjects even if they have already studied them at any other university.Applicants’ country should have good diplomatic relations with Japan.Applicants who have Japanese nationality cannot apply.Applicants must be born on or after April 2, 2001.Applicants should fulfill any one out of 3 conditions:Applicants who have completed 12 years of education in countries other than Japan.Applicants who have completed their studies at institutes equivalent to Japanese institutes in countries other thanApplicants who have passed an examination showing equivalency to the completion of 12 years of education in countries other than Japan.Applicants should be willing to learn Japanese language snd carry out their academic studies in Japanese.Applicants have to submit a health certificate in the given format which should be signed by a physician.Applicants should come to Japan between April 1, 2026, and April 7, 2026.Applicants must newly obtain a “Student” visa before entering Japan. If students will come to Japan without newly obtaining the “Student” visa, the payment of the scholarship will be cancelled.

Title: MEXT Scholarship 2026 in Japan | Fully Funded | Japanese Government Scholarship
Description:
The Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology (MEXT) is offeringfully funded scholarshipsin Japan for international students. This Japanese Government Scholarship is available for master’s and PhD degree programs. The recipents of the MEXT Scholarship 2026 will study at different Japanese universities as research Students. The excellent education system of Japan has made it a leading country in latest knowledge and technologies.Japan has transformed many innovative ideas into creative products by using state-of-the-art science, technology and medicine. Along with teaching academic courses, Japanese schools also focus on the development of human skills and abilities.
The purpose of MEXT Scholarship for 2026 Embassy Recommendation is to promote human resources who will strengthen friendship between the student’s country and Japan. The academic environment in Japanese universities allows students to think out of the box and enhances their critical thinking and creativity. During this MEXTresearch scholarship2026, students can expand their horizons through Japanese and other diverse cultures of the world. They will get international exposure,  make new contacts, have unforgettable memories and lifelong lessons.
Along with getting a degree, students will also acquire the skills and knowledge necessary for employment. They will get to improve their Japanese language skills and develop an international mindset. MEXT scholarship for Master’s and doctoral students will provide an incredible opportunity to conduct research in a supportive environment with latest facilities. After completing the study period, students can get a chance to work and stay in Japan. Students will not have to pay tuition fees and will also get allowances according to their degree programs to cover the cost of their living
Deadline: Varies from program to program. Check deadlines on the official website before applying.
Eligibility:
Research Students are: Students who are enrolled in a master’s, doctoral, or a professional graduate course at a graduate university. or Students who are conducting research in a specialized field at an undergraduate department of a university. or Students who are getting preparatory education in the Japanese language and other subjects before getting into the university.Non-regular students:Participants who arrive in Japan during the April term and Participants who arrive in Japan during the October term.Regular students:Students who will receive preparatory education before starting their enrolled program.Applicants must apply for the field of study they have already majored in or its relevant fields.The fields of study are specified by the Japanese Embassy or Consulate in the applicant’s country.Subjects that require practical training are not included in this scholarship program.Applicants should have nationality of a country that has diplomatic relations with Japan. Students who have Japanese nationality are not eligible to apply.Applicants should be born on or after April 2, 1991.Applicants must fulfill any one of the following conditions to get admission in either amaster’s or doctoral course (phase 1)at a Japanese graduate school.Applicants must have completed 16 years of education in countries other than Japan.Applicants who have completed a program equivalent to a bachelor’s degree.Applicants should be eligible for enrollment in a master’s course or doctoral course at a Japanese graduate school.For Doctoral course (phase 2):Applicants who have completed an overseas degree equivalent to a master’s or professional degree.Applicants who have already graduated from universities and are participating in research study for more than two years.Applicants must be willing to learn Japanese language and adapt to living in Japan.Applicants have to submit a health certificate in the given format which should be signed by a physician.Applicants have to choose their arrival period and then fill in the application form. (April term or October term).Applicants have to newly obtain a “Student” visa at the Japanese diplomatic mission situated in the applicant’s country or region of nationality.Scholarship period maybe extended if participants fulfill the requirements.

Title: MTCP Scholarship in Malaysia 2025 | Fully Funded | Study in Malaysia
Description:
Call for applications for the MTCP Scholarship in Malaysia 2025. This scholarship program is funded by the Malaysian Government and offered to the brilliant and outstanding students from developing countries. It is available for full time master’s degree programs. The Malaysian Technical Cooperation Programme (MTCP) scholarship is an incredible opportunity to explore the Malayisa’s rich culture, diversity, beautiful scenes, and natural landscapes.
Thepostgraduate scholarship program2025 is organized by the Government of Malaysia and will run for a period of 24 to 36 months. There are no restrictions regarding gender, race, or nationality. The MTCP was established in 1980 as part of Malaysia’s commitment to South-South cooperation. This initiative aims to share Malaysia’s development experiences and expertise with other developing countries.
The MTCPmaster’s degree scholarship for international studentshas multiple advantages with it. The MTCP aims to share the experiences of the Malaysian government with other developing countries that help them reach the pinnacles of success through a mission-driven platform. The MalaysianGovernment scholarshipsalso aims to strengthen the bilateral ties with developing countries. Moreover, it intends to encourage and promote cooperation between the South-South poles. Further, it will encourage and promote technical cooperation among the developing nations.
Deadline: The application deadline is13 June, 2025.
Eligibility: Applicants from developing nations are eligible to apply.Applicants must not be more than 35 years old at the time of application.Applicants should have an outstanding academic record, with a second class or a minimum CGPA of 3.5 in their undergraduate degree.A minimum score of 6 in IELTS or 60 in TOEFL is required, or previous degrees should have been obtained with English as the medium of instruction.Applicants must be in good health.Applicants can only be admitted to the listed universities in Malaysia.Applicants must have received an admission offer letter.

Title: Best Scholarships for International Students 2025-26 | Fully Funded
Description:
Do you want to study abroad but financial constraints have made it difficult? Here are some of theBestScholarships for International studentsoffered by different countries in a diverse range of fields and disciplines. These fully funded scholarships in China, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Azerbaijan, UK, Saudi Arabia, and Singapore will provide an incredible chance to explore the vibrant and diverse culture of these countries. The purpose of these top scholarships for international students is to develop and sustain good bonds among nations. These programs will promote cross cultural understanding and support outstanding individuals who have excellent academic records and achievements.
During these top 10scholarships for international students 2025, students will work on various research projects under the supervision of renowned researchers and scholars. The host universities will provide access to research laboratories, libraries, and computer labs during the study period. These opportunities will allow students to develop their career paths by equipping them with professional and technical skills. During scholarships, participants will get a chance to study and work with diverse fellow students coming from different backgrounds and cultures. They will learn from each other’s experiences and will return to their home countries with enhanced knowledge and skills.
The scholarship programs are offered by renowned universities who welcome participants from different cultures, races, religions, genders, and social segments. Select the scholarship program according to your educational background and apply before the application deadline.

Title: UST Scholarships 2025 in South Korea | Study in Korea
Description:
UST Scholarships 2025 offer excellent study and research opportunities in South Korea for international students from around the world. The goal of the University of Science and Technology (UST) scholarship is to support student researchers in engaging in self-directed, hands-on learning. Rather than relying on traditional, theory-based teaching, UST encourages students to actively identify and solve real-world problems while conducting research in advanced scientific environments.
These prestigious Korean scholarships for international students welcome applications from highly motivated and innovative individuals eager to pursue research-driven careers. By focusing on interdisciplinary technologies and offering education through on-site research experience, the UST program aims to develop students’ creative thinking and practical skills. The scholarship contributes to the advancement of both core and industrial technologies, preparing graduates to play key roles in the global innovation landscape.
The UST Scholarships 2025 for Master’s and PhD students go beyond academic training by also promoting cross-cultural interaction and global networking. Scholars will engage with fellow researchers from different countries, gaining valuable international exposure. These scholarships cover full tuition fees and provide monthly financial support to help manage living expenses, accommodation, meals, and other essential costs during the student’s stay in South Korea.
UST offers a broad selection of graduate programs across its 32 government-funded research institutes. Students can apply to the institute and research area that best match their academic background and interests. This flexible structure allows scholars to tailor their educational journey, gain in-demand skills, and contribute meaningfully to cutting-edge research and global scientific progress.
Deadline:
May 7, 2025.
Apply NowOfficial Link
Eligibility:
The University of Science and Technology (UST) in South Korea welcomes international students from all over the world to apply for its Master’s, Ph.D., and Integrated Master’s–Ph.D. programs. To apply, you must meet the following general conditions:
You and both of your parents must hold non-Korean nationality.You must meet the educational requirements depending on the program you choose.You must also meet the required English language proficiency (details available in the official guidelines).
Degree Offered: Master’s Leading to Ph.D.Master’s Degree ProgramPh.D. Program

Title: OUC Chinese Government Scholarship 2025 in China | Study in China
Description:
Applications for “The Silk Road Program” OUC Chinese Government Scholarships 2025 in China are now open for talented students from all across the world to study in Chinese Universities. During thisinternational scholarship program, Master’s and Doctoral students will get a chance to study Chinese Language for 1 year. All admitted students in Chinese universities will get living stipends according to their study programs. Students will not have to pay tuition fees and will also be offered accommodation on campus of OUC.
Thisfunded scholarship programfor bachelor’s, master’s and PhD students is offered in different fields including physical oceanography, aquaculture, Food Science and Engineering, Environmental Engineering, and Computer Science and Technology. Students can select and apply to the program that best suits their academic background and interest. This is an excellent opportunity to meet fellow students from across the world and learn from their experiences and knowledge.
Students from South-East Asian countries (Thailand, Vietnam, Malaysia), Pacific Island countries (Kiribati, Solomon Islands, Vanuatu), Indian Ocean Rim countries (Sri Lanka, Mauritius, Pakistan, Bangladesh) and other countries participating the Belt and Road Initiative are eligible to apply for this international scholarship program in China. OUC will review the application forms and nominate candidates. These nominated students will be funded by the Chinese Government Scholarships to study in China after approval by the China Scholarship Council.
Deadline:
The last date to apply is 15thMay, 2025.
Apply NowOfficial LinkJoin our WhatsApp Channel
Eligibility:
Applicants must have excellent academic record.Applicants should have high school diploma or its equivalent to apply for bachelor’s programs, and should be under the age of 25 while applying.Applicants must have bachelor’s degree to apply for master’s programs and should be under the age of 35 while applying.Applicants must have master’s degree to apply for doctoral programs and should be under the age of 40 while applying.Students who are applying for Chinese-taught majors must have a score above 180 in HSK.Students who are from non-English speaking countries and are applying for English-taught majors should have IELTS ≥ 5.5, TOFEL > 80, or provide Certificate of equivalent English proficiency Certificate/ proof that you have studied in English countries.Applicants should meet the admission requirements and criteria of Ocean University of China.Chinese government scholarship students are not allowed to get any other scholarships during their studies period.

Title: Azerbaijan Government Scholarship 2025-26 | Fully Funded
Description:
The Azerbaijan Government Scholarship 2025–2026, officially known as the Heydar Aliyev International Education Grant Program, is afully funded opportunity for international students. Launched in honor of the National Leader Heydar Aliyev, this scholarship is open to students from eligible countries who want to pursue bachelor’s, master’s, PhD, or preparatory courses in Azerbaijan. It covers all major academic fields and aims to strengthen global education ties through cultural and academic exchange.
Thisinternational scholarshipoffers a wide variety of degree programs such as agriculture, engineering, economics, international relations, business, design, public administration, and more. Selected students will study in leading Azerbaijani institutions while gaining valuable global experience. The goal of the program is to build human capacity, promote international cooperation, and offer students from other countries a chance to study in a culturally rich and academically strong environment.
All selected students will receive full financial support, including tuition fees, a monthly stipend, international airfare, medical insurance, and visa/residency permit assistance. The program also provides a great opportunity to explore Azerbaijan’s vibrant history, diverse culture, and modern education system. This scholarship is not just about academic learning, but also about building lifelong friendships, cross-cultural exchange, and shaping future global leaders. Apply now and take the first step toward a world-class education in Azerbaijan.
Deadline: The last date to apply is15 May 2025.( For first stage process)
Eligibility: Citizens of Azerbaijan are not eligible to apply.Individuals whose Azerbaijani citizenship has been canceled are also not eligible.For undergraduate and general medicine programs, candidates must be 35 years old or younger.For graduate and medical residency programs, candidates must be 40 years old or younger.For doctoral programs, candidates must be 45 years old or younger.A candidate with dual nationality can submit only one application.Only applications nominated by the respective government authorities of eligible countries will be considered.Candidates must be in good health
Program Duration: Bachelor’s Degree Scholarship: 4-5 YearsGeneral Medicine Program Scholarship: 5-6 YearsMaster’s Scholarships: 1.5-2 YearsMedical Residency Program Scholarship: 2-5 YearsDoctoral (PhD) Scholarship: 3 Years

Title: Joint Japan World Bank Scholarship Program 2025 | Fully Funded
Description:
Japan, the world’s technology hub, has introduced the scholarship avenue with the collaboration of the World Bank. The program is known as the name Joint Japan World Bank Scholarship Program 2025. The program is available for the nationals of developing countries who possess Bachelor’s degrees. Thefully-funded master’s degree scholarshipis aimed at fulfilling the mission of the World Bank to forge modern dynamic approaches towards capacity development.
The Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program (JJ/WBGSP) 2025 to study abroad under the well-known name of the World Bank and innovative Japan is not so far from you. The program aims to promote economic growth and inculcate the seeds of good nations. The joint venture of both has used the means of quality education, capacity building, and human resource development to achieve the aforementioned goal of the most prestigious program.
All you need to have passion for doing something unique that contributes as an effort towards the uplifting of your nation in particular and of the world in general. The chance to get a full scholarship under the world’s powerful entities is easily reachable now. Theinternational scholarship programhas enhanced the network of over 6000 professionally trained and experienced experts and scholars.
The Joint Japan World Bank Graduate Scholarships 2025 are the most eye-catching program these days as the robusxt economic giants are hosting them. With the range of participating programs, the scholarship opportunity is available in Japan, Europe, Africa, Oceania, and the US in their key area of development. Students who have the spirit to serve humanity are encouraged to become a part of this international forum.
Deadline: The application deadline for the JJ/WBGSP scholarship program 2025 for the first application window isMay 23, 2025.
Eligibility: National of World Bank listed countries.Not a dual-country citizen of a developed country.Not an employee of any of the organizations under the World Bank Group.Not a close relative by blood of any of the employees working in any of the World Bank Group’s organizations.Possess a Bachelor’s degree.Must have spent three years after getting a Bachelor’s degreeHave three years of work experience after getting a Bachelor’s degree.

Title: SK Global Scholarship in Korea 2025 | Fully Funded | Korea University Scholarship
Description:
Korea University SK Global Scholarship Program 2025 is offered to international students to provide them with the opportunity to study at Korea University Graduate School and learn advance and innovative techniques and technologies. The purpose of thisfully funded scholarship in Koreais to promote global educational exchange and enhance friendship and cooperation between Republic of Korea and these 32 countries.
Korea University is a world-class research-oriented University which has state-of-the-art research centers and laboratories. SKscholarship program for international studentsis offered in the fields of Information Technology, Artificial Intelligence, Electrical and Computer Engineering, and Physics. KU international scholarship programs have various unique benefits which include high level of engagement between the students and faculty members within a supportive campus environment.
The academic programs offered are enriched with a broad range of interdisciplinary areas that promote analytical and research related activities beyond departmental limitations. Korea University scholarship program for master’s students is committed to promote outstanding innovative individuals who will play significant role in the changing world of The FIR by supporting first AI graduate degree program of Korea. KU global scholarship program offers support for entrance fee, tuition fee, airfare, living expenses, and Korean language training fee.
Deadline:
The last date to apply is 31stMarch, 2025.
Apply NowOfficial LinkJoin our WhatsApp Channel
Eligibility: Applicants must be from one of the 32 countries eligible for this program.List of eligible countries:19 European countries include Austria, Belarus, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Georgia, Hungary, Latvia, Lithuania, Moldova, Montenegro, North Macedonia, Poland, Romania, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, and Ukraine.11 Southeast Asian countries include East Timor, Laos, Malaysia, Myanmar, Vietnam, Brunei, Singapore, Indonesia, Cambodia, Thailand, and Philippines.India and Pakistan.The applicants’ parents must not have South Korean citizenship.Applicants will not be selected if their citizenship changes to a country which is not included in the list of 32 countries during the selection process.Applicants must have a bachelor’s degree or are expected to graduate from the university.Applicants must submit their English proficiency language test scores. TOEFL iBT score report of 71 of higher. IELTS 5.5 or higher, CEFR level B2 or higher, New TEPS 326 or higher , a score report of TOPIK level 3 or higher.Applicants who have completed their bachelor’s degree in English are exempted to submit proof of English language proficiency.

Masters Program (2 years)

Title: UI Great Scholarship 2025 in Indonesia | Fully Funded
Description:
The UI Great Scholarship 2025 is afully funded opportunity for international studentsto pursue a master’s degree at Universitas Indonesia (UI), one of the leading universities in Asia. This scholarship covers tuition fees, living costs, visa support, and more, making it an excellent chance to study in Indonesia. Students from all over the world can apply and benefit from this program designed to support academic excellence.
This prestigious scholarship allows students to choose from a wide range of disciplines, including medicine, law, engineering, business, social sciences, and more. The scholarship supports talented students who demonstrate outstanding academic performance and a strong desire to contribute to their field. With full financial coverage, scholars can focus on their studies without worrying about expenses, while experiencing Indonesia’s diverse culture and rich heritage.
The UIscholarship for international studentsensures a high-quality education at Universitas Indonesia, recognized globally for its academic excellence and research contributions. The scholarship includes a four-semester tuition fee waiver, monthly living allowance, visa and travel support, and health insurance coverage. Additionally, students needing Bahasa Indonesia proficiency will receive one year of language training before starting their degree, fully covered by the scholarship.
Deadline:
The last date to apply is27 March, 2025.
Apply NowUI Admission 2025 BrochureJoin our WhatsApp Channel

Title: Singapore International Pre-Graduate Award 2025 (SIPGA)
Description:
Singapore International Pre-Graduate Award (SIPGA) is a scholarship opportunity in Singapore for students to work with eminent scientists at A*STAR’s Research Entities and experience the dynamic scientific environment. The application process of the SIPGAundergraduate scholarship programis open to students pursuing bachelor’s or master’s degrees in Computing and Information Science, Biomedical Science, Physical Science, or Engineering-related fields for two- to six-month attachments. You will get to choose up to 3 research projects from a wide range of projects being offered by the intuitions according to your area of interest.
Access to some of the Asia Pacific region’s fastest-growing economies is possible through the portal of Singapore. The SIPGA Awrad 2024 will enable you to conduct your research study in a foreign country and will enable you to build international connections with fellow participants coming from different regions of the world. International students studying will be encouraged to participate in a lively and culturally varied research community. This is your golden chance to collaborate with esteemed and internationally recognized researchers in a multicultural setting.
If you are chosen for thisinternational research opportunity,you will have access to state-of-the-art laboratories and exceptional research mentors who will guide you throughout your program of study. The environment at A*Star is ideal for honing your research-related abilities and accomplishing your objectives. Seize the chance to begin a transformative academic career and become a part of an international network of exceptional scholars.
Bright students who have a strong interest in science and research and a passion for it can now study at internationally recognized institutions through this Singapore scholarship program. SIPGA is devoted to giving young researchers a chance to participate in hands-on research at A*STAR and other institutions, where they may seek guidance from scientists who are passionate about training the next generation of researchers. Along with foreign exposure, you will be given a monthly stipend of $2,000 to bear the cost of living in Singapore. Are you ready to explore a new country along with seeking quality education? Apply now before the deadline approaches.
Deadline:
31  Mar 2025.
Apply NowOfficial LinkJoin our WhatsApp Channel
Eligibility: Students studying in their 3rd and 4th years of undergraduate and master’s students enrolled in science, technology, Engineering, and Mathematics fields can here.Students should expect to get a minimum second class in their Bachelor’s degree.Applicants must be enrolled in their home university while they are in Singapore for this program.Students should have excellent written and spoken English.Participants should have a keen interest in the field of research
Host University: AGENCY FOR SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND RESEARCH (A*STAR)

Title: Skoltech University Scholarship in Russia 2025 | Fully Funded
Description:
Skoltech University Scholarship in Russia 2025 is a great opportunity for talented students who are in the field of science and technology. Thefully-funded scholarship for international studentsin science and technology comes under the multi-year collaboration between Skoltech University and the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT). The application of the scholarships is open for post-graduate students i.e. master’s degree students and PhD students.
Thefully-funded graduate scholarshipin Russia also allows highly capable students to participate in conferences by world-leading universities. Almost 1/3 of students from Skoltech University get the chance to spend a semester at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT). The Russian scholarship is surely on the road to learning innovations, research, and educational techniques.
The scholarship in Russia by the Skolkovo Institute of Science and Technology along with the aforementioned learning benefits to the scholarship holders. Keeping in view, the student’s capabilities and academic achievements, a stipend is set by the university. In this regard, the minimum stipend starts from 40,000 PUR per month and so on. So, due to its great number of benefits, students who want to acquire higher knowledge in the field of science and technology must not miss this opportunity.
To secure this fully funded scholarship for international students, the applicants are required to pass the online test. To elaborate more, the English language proficiency report e.g. IELTS and TOEFL is highly recommended to get this full scholarship. Furthermore, the GPA and grades of the students matter a lot in the selection process. To sum up, to be selected for this full scholarship program the students must be excellent and extraordinary in every aspect
Deadline:
Deadline for the MSc Scholarship Program: July 7, 2025Deadline for the PhD Scholarship Program: July 1, 2025.
Apply NowOfficial LinkJoin our WhatsApp Channel
Eligibility: All domestic and international students are eligible to apply.For Master’s degree scholarshipThe students must have graduated from recognized universities in the final year of undergraduate studies.For PhD scholarshipThe students must have a master’s degree from a recognized university in a relevant field.If a student has a bachelor’s or master’s in humanities, social sciences, or business, he/she must have significant training in the mentioned fields to get selected.No GRE score is required.If the applicant has received a degree from the university in English language TOEFL or IELTS score is not required.Applicants must prove their English proficiency, as Skoltech’s instruction is in English. Accepted tests and minimum scores are:TOEFL iBT: 80TOEFL ITP: 450IELTS: 6.0These test scores must be valid for two years from the test date. Applicants with a degree from a university where English is the medium of instruction are exempt from this requirement. No exceptions are made, and only TOEFL and IELTS scores are accepted.

Title: Indonesian Government Scholarship 2025-26 – KNB Scholarship | Fully Funded
Description:
Indonesian Government Scholarship 2025-26 KNB scholarship is afully funded scholarship opportunityfor prospective international students from developing nations who wish to study for a bachelor’s, master’s, or doctoral degree at one of Indonesia’s universities. This scholarship program aims to support the growth and expansion of human resources in developing nations. The Kemitraan Negara Berkembang Scholarship is expected to strengthen people-to-people relations between Indonesia and recipient countries.
KNB Scholarships 2025 provides the opportunity for international students to study at prestigious Indonesian universities while simultaneously residing in one of the most active and diverse societies in the world. Thisfull scholarship programwill select 222 participants which will consist of 30 Bachelor students, 162 Master students, and 30 Doctoral students. Receiving the scholarship will allow students to enroll in high-quality degree programs offered by the 31 partner universities.
Thisscholarship for international studentsprovides a diverse range of programs which include Biology, Engineering, Economics, Physics, Chemistry, Visual Art and Design, Architecture, Transportation, Management Science, Pharmacy, Astronomy, Mathematics, Earth Sciences, Instrumentation and Control, Logistics, Water Resource  Management, Tourism planning, Urban and Regional Planning, Computer Science, Informatics, Statistics, Communication Science, Accountancy, Law, Psychology, Veterinary Medicine, Library and Information, Nutrition, English Language and Literature, Midwifery, Public Administration, Anthropology, Nursing, Sociology, International Relations, History, Disaster Management, and Political Science.
These degrees will provide a basis for success beyond university by raising their intellectual standing, strengthening their abilities, and opening up more career options. Students will further get to experience life in a multiethnic and multilingual community. After completing the degree programs, all students will have a research publication of their own which will benefit them for their future research studies. Students will get a monthly allowance to manage their cost of living during their stay which is a cherry on top.
Deadline: The application deadline for the Indonesian Government Scholarship Program in Indonesia isMarch 7, 2025.
Eligibility:
Maximum age should be 21 years old for Bachelors, 35 years for Masters and 40 years for doctoral degreeCandidates applying for a Bachelor’s degree should not already have a Bachelor’s degreeCandidates applying for a Master’s degree should not already have a Master’s degreeCandidates applying for a doctoral degree should not already have a doctoral degreeCandidates must take an English proficiency test within the last two years (if from non-English-speaking countries). Students from English-speaking countries or enrolled in English-taught programs are exempt but must provide an official university letter confirming the program is in EnglisParticipants should have all the required documents mentioned belowAll the documents should either be in English or Bahasa

HSK 4 180 or more for specialization in science, technology, economics, and management. HSK 5 180 or more for specialization in humanities, philosophy, and social sciences.For English language courses, the IELTS score must be 5. 5, or higher and for TOEFL, the score must be 80 or higher.Applicants belonging to countries where English is an official language are exempted from the proof of English proficiency certificate.The applicants applying for master’s degrees should possess a bachelor’s degree and be under the age of 35 years.The applicants applying for doctoral degrees must possess a master’s degree and be under the age of 40.

Title: Global Korea Scholarship 2025 | Fully Funded | KGSP
Description:
The prestigious and highly competitive Global Korea Scholarship 2025 is now open for applications. The GKS 2025 was previously known as the KGSP Korean Government Scholarship Program. This is afully-funded scholarship, master’s, and Ph.D. degree program. This scholarship opportunity is sponsored by the Korean government. The KGSP 2025 will select more than 1820 international students from 155 countries who want to who wish to pursue a graduate-level degree (master’s or doctoral) or research in Korea. For detailed answers to frequently asked questions about the GKS program, check out our comprehensive FAQ guidehere.
All selected students will be placed at different universities in South Korea. Korean Ministry of Education aims to increase international exchanges and competititeness. There are more than 104,000 international students who have been on this Korean scholarship since 2016. Fields are not limited, all candidates would get plenty of options to pursue their careers. There are two ways to apply for this KGSP 2024, either submitting their documents to the Korean Embassy of their country or directly to the domestic university of Korea.
This South Korean Scholarship (Global Korea Scholarship for Graduate Degrees) is one of the most prestigious and competitive scholarships in the world. It stands on par with other fully-funded international scholarship programs such as the US Fulbright Scholarship,Chinese Government Scholarship,Australia Awards Scholarships,Turkey Burslari Scholarships, Austria Government Scholarship, Brunei Darussalam Scholarship,Romania Government Scholarship, New Zealand Government Scholarship,Netherlands Government ScholarshipStipendium Hungricum Scholarship, and Daad Scholarship in Germany.
Why one should study in South Korea?South Korea provides well-structured scholarships, affordable living expenses, and low accommodation costs, making it an attractive destination for international students. The country offers a unique opportunity to build cross-cultural understanding, work in advanced laboratories, and experience the vibrant culture and modern cities. With its excellent academic standards and welcoming environment, South Korea is an ideal place for students seeking quality education and a global perspective
Deadline: Every country’s Korean embassy and the domestic university have different deadlines, so hurry up and apply as soon as possible.
Eligibility: All international students can apply.Korean citizens are not eligible to apply.A candidate applying for a graduate program must be under the age of 40 years.Master’s Program Applicant: Must hold a bachelor‟s degree or a level of educationequivalent to or higher than a bachelor‟s degree.Doctoral Program Applicant: Must hold a master‟s degree or a level of education equivalent to or higher than a master‟s degree.Research Program Applicant: Must have received an invitation from one of the partner universities.A person who has already availed of the Korean scholarship is not eligible to apply.A candidate should be in good health.
Program Duration: Doctoral Degree Program:4 years1 year of the Korean language program3 years of the regular degree programMaster’s Degree Program:3 years1 year of the Korean language program2 years of a degree programResearch Program:6 Months or 1 Year

Host University: A monthly stipend of RMB 2,500 to bachelor’s students and RMB 3,000 to master’s students will be given.Tuition fee will be waived completely.Health Insurance will be included.Free accommodation within the university will be provided.

Title: UNESCO World Heritage Residence Scholarship 2025 in Sweden | Fully Funded
Description:
UNESCO World Heritage Residence scholarship 2025 in Sweden is intended for individuals who are interested in developing a cultural or creative connection between the World Heritage site Decorated Farmhouses of Hälsingland and other unique locations of the world. UNESCO motivates countries to become a signatory to the World Heritage Convention and work towards preserving their natural and cultural heritage. The organization plays an important role in helping the States Parties by offering technical assistance and professional training.
To be a part of this UNESCO scholarship, applicants should have a cultural concept relevant to the UNESCO World Heritage list. Theinternational scholarship in Europeis for designers, creative workers, artists, researchers, and other cultural activists from all over the world. Artists should take inspiration from Hälsingland’s Decorated Farmhouses and should represent the project’s idea clearly. It is important to explain how your project links World Heritage sites. To work on their proposed projects, artists will be invited to Sweden and will be given a budget amount.
World’s heritage features distinctive and diverse cultural and natural places like the Great Wall of China, the Pyramids of Egypt, the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, Rohtas Fort in Pakistan and many others. During this fully funded scholarship, artists can illustrate their projects in different forms including research, virtual reality, film, audio, photo, storytelling, communication, handicraft, and painting. Apply now if you are someone who is passionate about art and culture.
Deadline: The last date to apply is 16thFebruary, 2025.
Eligibility: Applicants should submit a unique project idea.The theme of the project should be relevant to UNESCO World Heritage List.Applicants submitted project must develop a connection between UNESCO World Heritage Site and any of the 7 Farmhouses of Hälsingland.Incomplete applications will not be accepted.Applications submitted after the deadline will not be considered.
Program Duration:
4 weeks

Title: Top 10 Japan Scholarships for International Students | Japanese Scholarships
Description:
Ready for a scholarship journey to Japan? Explore the Top 10 Japan Scholarships for international students, offering incredible opportunities to support your academic and living expenses. The top-class Japanese Universities offer higher education studies through fully or partially funded scholarships. The well-known organizations are offering different kinds of grants and donations to the students to pursue their Bachelor’s, Master’s, and Doctoral degrees. Such opportunities will help enrich your academic knowledge and impart the relevant skills in your personality to grow professionally.
The scholarships to study in Japan are an outstanding option that would help you reach the zenith of glory. These international opportunities are available for international and domestic students who wish to enroll in multiple fields. These scholarship opportunities in Japan will help you drive your future careers under the supervision of professional experts. True professional counselors and mentors will prepare you for the wonderful job opportunities in the market. Considering the expensive higher educational studies, this is the best chance for you to win the scholarship and go abroad to fulfill your dreams.
Talking about Japan, it is famous for its natural sights, traditional culture, architecture, and technology. Japan has been known as a leader in innovation and technology in the world. Japanese Educational system is ranked number 7thamong the educational systems of the globe. It is the safest and most friendly country to live in and pursue your study. Seeking admission to one of the popular study destinations has been a dream of every student which can easily be fulfilled now. It would be worth studying in Japan because Japanese universities are among the Top 200 universities in the world and Japan ranks first in the Top 10 places to study abroad.
Although it is quite worrying to select the country for studying abroad excellent safety standards, easy accessibility to resources, and high-quality living standards have made Japan a top educational destination for international students. These Japanese scholarship programs have opened the avenues for you to study in the best places in Japan. This article will get you familiar withthe different study opportunities that will help you make your dreams true to studying at the 10 best international universities in Japan.
Host University:
The Yokohama National University Scholarship Program is designed to facilitate students from developing countries to come and take admission at any of the following degree levels: Bachelor, Graduate, and Doctoral. Thisfully funded scholarshipis sponsored by the World Bank and the Government of Japan through the Joint Japan or World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program. A monthly allowance of 152,000 Yen, a traveling allowance of 500 US dollars, and a round-trip airfare ticket to Japan are all covered under the scholarship package. Moreover, entrance examination fees, admission test fees, and tuition fees are also covered. You should not wait for a second and apply now as per your desire to continue your studies abroad.
For more info, visit theYNU Scholarship in Japan.
Degree Offered:
The Government of Japan and the World Bank have jointly introduced the scholarship for undergraduate, graduate, and PhD degree programs. If you have professional experience in the related field of interest and you want to make a significant impact on your community, you are eligible to apply for this prestigious scholarship. This opportunity covers many popular universities in Japan including the University of Tokyo, Meiji University, Keijo University, and others. If you have worked in the development sector, you will be preferred. The tuition fee, monthly stipend, round trip airfare ticket, traveling allowance, and health insurance are all covered under this outstanding opportunity.
For more details, visit: theWorld Bank Graduate Scholarship Program.

Harbin Institute of Technology Scholarship in China providesfully funded scholarshipsfor master’s and doctoral programs. The HIT scholarship for international students will cover all the expenses of the selected candidates.
In 1920, the Harbin Institute of Technology was established and since then it has been offering multidisciplinary fields of study and empowering many individuals around the world. HIT established the first School of Astronautics in China. It is one of the leading universities in China. All candidates will be learning leadership skills and conducting research under the supervision of the best researchers.
All students eager to pursue their postgraduate studies in the field of Science and Engineering should apply for this CSC scholarships in China. Harbin Institute of Technology will select the best candidates for this scholarship. Presently HIT is a member of China’s top nine University Union (C9). It is a National Key University with science and engineering as its core and has developed with management, liberal arts, economy, law, and other disciplines.
Chinese Government Scholarship is one of the world’stop scholarship programsin the world. Studying in China on a fully-funded scholarship is an excellent opportunity for those who want to study at top universities in China.274 Chinese universities are offering CSC Scholarships to international students. The CGS scholarship covers all the costs of the selected students for the duration of the program.
Deadline:
Stage 1: December 31st, 2024 and Stage 2: February 20th, 2025
Apply NowOfficial Link
Eligibility:
All international and non-Chinese candidates may apply.Applicants applying for the master’s program must hold a bachelor’s degree.Applicants applying for the doctoral program must hold a master’s degree.Applicants can apply under the age of 35 years for a master’s program.Applicants can apply under the age of 40 years for the Doctoral program.Applicants should have a good academic record.The applicant should have good research ability.
Learnhow to accept an acceptance letter from a professor.
Program Duration: Master’s Scholarship in China:2-3 YearsPhD Scholarship in China:4-5 Years
